com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.client.jmx

Class LogsReplicationServerBeanWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.client.jmx.LogsReplicationServerBeanWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogsReplicationServerMXBean

    public class LogsReplicationServerBeanWrapper
extends Object
implements LogsReplicationServerMXBean
    Wrapper class for the logger replication server mxbean. Provides synchronized access to the bean and records whether or not the replication server is online or offline.

      • getDirectorySnapshot

        public List<FileInfo> getDirectorySnapshot(String directory,
                                           boolean triggerDirectoryWatch)
        Description copied from interface: LogsReplicationServerMXBean
        Retrieve a directory snapshot.
        Specified by:
        getDirectorySnapshot in interface LogsReplicationServerMXBean
        Parameters:
        directory - The snapshot is retrieved from this directory.
        triggerDirectoryWatch - If true then watching of the directory for changes is initiated or maintained if its already initiated. If false then a directory snapshot is retrieved with no side effect on directory watching.
        Returns:
        The directory snapshot as a list of FileInfo objects.

      • pushData

        public void pushData(String remoteDirectoryPath,
                     String filename,
                     long offset,
                     String connectionAddress,
                     int connectionPort,
                     int connectionToken)
        Description copied from interface: LogsReplicationServerMXBean
        Request data to be pushed to the client.
        Specified by:
        pushData in interface LogsReplicationServerMXBean
        Parameters:
        remoteDirectoryPath - The path to the file.
        filename - The filename containing the data to be sent to the client.
        offset - The offset within the file to send to the client.
        connectionAddress - The address of the client.
        connectionPort - The connection of the client.
        connectionToken - A token placed in the stream to be sent to the client.
